name: Bacteria (itch) (Bardon)
description:
There is a 7x7 grid. Youstart with 2 bacteria, the CPU,  too.  First you must select a bacteria and then an empty field nearby to place a new bacteria. When bacteria of the CPU are near they get your color. The game is finished when no more fields are left empty. When you have more bacteria in the end you have won.

Moving is with cursor-keys, select with space-bar.

I made this game in 3 hours!
